projects.title: Content Strategy for Tech Startups
projects.summaryItalic: A comprehensive content strategy developed for an emerging tech startup, focusing on audience engagement, brand consistency, and conversion optimization across digital platforms.
projects.summaryNormal:
This project involved creating a tailored content strategy that aligned with the client's business objectives while addressing their unique market challenges. Working closely with their marketing team, I developed a framework that integrated SEO best practices, user-centered design principles, and compelling storytelling techniques.

The strategy included content calendars, style guides, and performance metrics that allowed for consistent measurement and optimization. The implementation resulted in a 45% increase in user engagement and significantly improved conversion rates across their digital properties.

projects.title: UX Writing for Financial App
projects.summaryItalic: Redesigned the user experience copy for a financial application to improve clarity, reduce support tickets, and increase user engagement and retention.
projects.summaryNormal:
For this project, I collaborated with the product and design teams to reimagine the microcopy throughout the application, focusing on making complex financial concepts accessible to all users.

The project included auditing existing content, creating a comprehensive UX writing style guide, and redesigning error messages, onboarding flows, and feature descriptions. Following implementation, user understanding improved by 37%, and support tickets decreased by 25%.
